Articles.Content:
Hi,

When approaching another spacecraft for docking i cant see it no matter how close i am... like 200 metres and i still cant see it. Probably as a newbie i just need to press some key to make it visible. Can anyone tell me what i can do?  Thx Wolf

Oh and i have the mech jeb installed,  but had the problem before...

Edited March 16, 2019 by Spac_Wolf
Forgot mod.
F4 toggles the brackets around other ships.  Is that what you're having problems with?  I've accidentally turned it off myself a few times.
